item.title: Hello, World: The Genesis of a Privacy Researcher
item.description: Welcome to L K’s Nexus üêæ This is the beginning of a digital record dedicated to Blockchain Privacy, Zero-Knowledge Proofs (ZKP), and the pursuit of digital sovereignty. As a researcher in Maastricht, I’ve spent years analyzing the delicate balance between transparency and privacy in decentralized systems. This blog will serve as a repository for: Research Notes: Deep dives into MPC, ZKP, and privacy-preserving protocols. Security Analysis: Generalized findings on modern web infrastructure security.
